alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 2:26PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Jackson and northeastern Trempealeau Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 225 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Whitehall, moving southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Black River Falls around 250 PM CDT. Millston around 300 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Shamrock, The Black River Correctional Center, Pigeon Creek Campground, York, Potters Flowage, Vaudreuil, Perry Creek Recreation Area, North Branch, Pleasantville and Lost Falls Campground. This includes Interstate 94 between mile markers 91 and 132. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
